snippet: A report by German researchers said that West Germany’s athletes were systematically doped with government backing from the 1970s, and possibly earlier.
abstract: Report by German researchers says that West Germany’s athletes were systematically doped with government backing from the 1970s, and possibly earlier.
lead_paragraph: A report by German researchers said that West Germany’s athletes were systematically doped with government backing from the 1970s, and possibly earlier.

headline.main: Study Says West Germany’s Athletes Used Doping
headline.print_headline: Study Says West Germany Used Doping
